name: Super Jacked Up Tomato Face Johnson
name_original: Super Jacked Up Tomato Face Johnson
description:
Super Jacked Up Tomato Face Johnson is a fast paced twitch platformer made for the Game Boy Color.  Collect all the coins to complete levels within the time limit. Do it super fast and you'll unlock stars needed to progress through each world.

CONTROLS GAME BOY
KEYBOARDMoveD-padArrow KeysJumpAZBackBXPause (Menu)
StartEnter

Game uses Auto-save feature.

Made for Game Boy Showdown 2022 using GB Studio.

Play in browser or download the .gbc ROM to play on your console of choice.
Please Note: Only for GBC. Due to some mechanics that take advantage of palette swapping, this game will not function on the DMG Game Boy.

A game by Gumpy Function
Music by Vault Kid
